import{LOG_IN_REQUEST,LOG_IN_SUCCESS,LOG_OUT}from"../Constant/Constant";var initstage={// eslint-disable-next-line no-undef
token:localStorage.getItem("token")};var LogInuser=function LogInuser(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initstage;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case LOG_IN_REQUEST:{return{token:action.payload.token};}case LOG_IN_SUCCESS:{return{token:action.payload.token};}case LOG_OUT:{return{token:false};}default:return state;}};export default LogInuser;
